meta.description: Determine the number of long and short cables to produce to maximize profit given gold constraints and demand requirements.

params.name: gold_requirement
params.description: Gold required per cable type in mg

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per cable type in dollars

objective.name: max_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from selling cables

constraints.name: gold_constraint
constraints.description: Total gold used cannot exceed available gold

constraints.name: demand_constraint
constraints.description: At least 5 times the number of short cables are needed than long cables

constraints.name: min_long_cables
constraints.description: At least 10 long cables need to be made
